Description_lang: While under the effects of a casted $?c1[Arcane Surge][Combustion], you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting $?c1[Arcane Soul][Hyperthermia] for $?c1[${$s1/1000}][${$s3/1000}] sec, plus an additional $?c1[${$s2/1000}.1][${$s4/1000}.1] sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.$?c1[$@spellicon451038$@spellname451038:$@spelldesc451038][$@spellicon383874 $@spellname383874:$@spellaura383874]
